contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 19, 1939 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Class 2)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Class 2) 20 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-class-2
Recollections of Weber
Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £3, 4th £2. March contest - 1st Bridgwater Imperial, 2nd Bristol Aeroplane Works, 3rd Midsomer Norton. Bands who had not won a prize greater than £6 since 1934. 16 bands competed.
Jan. 24, 2014, 8:27 p.m. Jan. 25, 2019, 12:50 p.m.
1 Mabe Band R. J. G Thomas
2 Lydney Band R. O. Hodges
3 Yorkley Onward Band Horace Jones
4 Single Hill W. Horler
